title: What Does Getting An Addiction To Pills Do To You?
body:
I have been given these pain pills from when i left surgery, and they gave a lot of them. The feeling they give is dizzyness, gets rid of pain, and makes me feel calm. If I was to get addicted to these pills, what would happen and how would I stop the addiction?

I know some people in my college that got addicted to some stuff and now they shake a lot.
